 DzShape ()

Detailed Description

A container class for a geometry and related materials, etc.

A container class that references a DzGeometry and holds all the pertinent material definitions, etc for that geometry.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

DzError DzShape::addMaterial ( DzMaterial *  newmat  )  [slot]

Adds the given material to the available material list for this shape. Also sets the currently active material index.

Parameters:
newmat Shared pointer referencing the material to be added to the list of materials for this shape.
void DzShape::addRigidityGroup ( DzRigidityGroup *  group  )  [slot]

Adds the rigidity group to this shape. The shape takes ownership of the group and will delete it.

void DzShape::addShapeInstance ( DzAbstractShapeInstance *  instance  )  [slot]
Parameters:
instance the instance to add to this shape. The shape takes ownership of the instance.
void DzShape::clearMaterialSelection (  )  [slot]

Sets the selection status to false for all materials of this shape.

Populates matPtrs with a list of all materials on the shape.

QObjectList DzShape::getAllMaterials (  )  const [slot]

Provided for DAZ Script access, plug-in developers should use the more efficient getAllMaterials( DzMaterialPtrList& ) method.

Returns:
A list of all materials for this shape
void DzShape::getAllRenderAssemblyPrioritizedMaterials ( DzMaterialPtrList &  prioritizedMaterials  )  const [virtual]

Populates prioritizedMaterials with a list of all materials in the assebly, ordered by render priority from highest to lowest. Default implementation calls getAllRenderPrioritizedMaterials(DzMaterialPtrList&)

Returns:
A list of all materials in this shape, ordered by render priority from highest to lowest.

DzError DzShape::insertMaterial ( DzMaterial *  newmat,
int  index = -1 
) [slot]

Inserts the given material at the given index in the material list, or appends to the list of index is <0 or out of range. Also sets the currently active material index.

Parameters:
newmat Shared pointer referencing the material to be added to the list of materials for this shape.
index The index at which to insert the material. If -1, it will be appended to the material list.

void DzShape::moveGeometryRegion ( DzShape *  newShape  )  [slot]
Parameters:
newShape the shape to move the geometry region of this shape too. Moves the geometry region from this shape to the new shape. If newShape is NULL, or there is no GeometryRegion this method does nothing.

void DzShape::rebuildBaseMap ( int  whichUVSet  )  [virtual, slot]

Virtual method which when reimplemented by inheriting classes will rebuild the base map of the base geometry with the specified uv set.

Parameters:
whichUVSet The UV Set index in the list of this shapes uv sets which which to build the new map with.

Reimplemented in DzFacetShape.

DzError DzShape::removeMaterial ( DzMaterial *  mat  )  [slot]

Removes the given material from this shape. Also removes any references to this materal that existed on any faces.

Parameters:
mat Shared pointer referencing the material to be removed from the list of materials for this shape.

const QString &  defaultMaterial = QString::null 
) [virtual, slot]
Parameters:
material Name of the material to remove.
defaultMaterial Name of the material to assign the removed materials faces to. If empty a default is used.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

void DzShape::setGeometryRegion ( DzGeometryRegion *  region  )  [slot]

Sets the shapes geometry region to the specified region. If the shape currently has a region and its element parent is the shape it will be deleted. Otherwise it is just replaced.

Parameters:
region The DzGeometryRegion to be the new geometry region of this shape.

void DzShape::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path).

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented from DzBase.

Reimplemented in DzFacetShape.
